title: Dave Grohl Joins Kim Deal to Perform Pixies’ “Gigantic”: Watch
description: The Foo Fighters frontman made a surprise appearance during Deal's concert in London. Dave Grohl Joins Kim Deal to Perform Pixies’ “Gigantic”: Watch Jaeden Pinder
author: Jaeden Pinder
excerpt: At the London stop of Kim Deal’s ongoing tour, she was joined by Foo Fighters’ frontman Dave Grohl to perform Pixies’ “Gigantic.”
text: At the London stop of Kim Deal’s 2025 tour, The Breeders’ frontwoman brought out Dave Grohl to perform Pixies’ “Gigantic.” Watch the replay below. On Friday night (June 20th), the Foo Fighters frontman joined the former Pixies bassist onstage at Roundhouse in London. Deal and Grohl have performed this track together a handful of times over the years, including at a Vets Aid show in 2022 and at an Austin City Limits post-festival concert in 2023. Before launching into their rendition Grohl joked, “I’ll sing whatever you ask me to sing. I’ll do whatever you ask me to do,” while Deal laughed along. Get Kim Deal Tickets Here Kim Deal will appear at a handful of festivals this summer and early fall, including at Newport Folk Festival, Ohana Festival, and the free Washington-based CHOMP! Festival (get tickets here). In October, Foo Fighters will trek across Asia, and later headline Mexico City’s Corona Capital Festival in November (get tickets here). Kim Deal released her debut solo album Nobody Loves You More last year. Foo Fighters released their 11th album But Here We Are in 2023. Kim Deal 2025 Tour Dates: 06/22 — Berlin, DE @ Metropol 06/24 — Zagreb, HR @ INmusic Festival 07/23 — Chicago, IL @ Thalia Hall * with BNNY 07/25 — Newport, RI @ Newport Folk Festival 08/16 — Redmond, WA @ CHOMP! Festival 09/26 — Dana Point, CA @ Ohana Festival Foo Fighters 2025 Tour Dates: 10/02 — Jakarta, ID @ Carnaval Ancol 10/04 — Singapore, SG @ F1 10/07 — Tokyo, JP @ Saitama Super Arena 10/10 — Osaka, JP @ Glion Arena Kobe 11/14 — Mexico City, MX @ Corona Capital
html:
At the London stop of Kim Deal’s 2025 tour, The Breeders’ frontwoman brought out Dave Grohl to perform Pixies’ “Gigantic.” Watch the replay below.

On Friday night (June 20th), the Foo Fighters frontman joined the former Pixies bassist onstage at Roundhouse in London. Deal and Grohl have performed this track together a handful of times over the years, including at a Vets Aid show in 2022 and at an Austin City Limits post-festival concert in 2023. Before launching into their rendition Grohl joked, “I’ll sing whatever you ask me to sing. I’ll do whatever you ask me to do,” while Deal laughed along.

Get Kim Deal Tickets Here

Kim Deal will appear at a handful of festivals this summer and early fall, including at Newport Folk Festival, Ohana Festival, and the free Washington-based CHOMP! Festival (get tickets here). In October, Foo Fighters will trek across Asia, and later headline Mexico City’s Corona Capital Festival in November (get tickets here).

Kim Deal released her debut solo album Nobody Loves You More last year. Foo Fighters released their 11th album But Here We Are in 2023.

Kim Deal 2025 Tour Dates:
06/22 — Berlin, DE @ Metropol
06/24 — Zagreb, HR @ INmusic Festival
07/23 — Chicago, IL @ Thalia Hall * with BNNY
07/25 — Newport, RI @ Newport Folk Festival
08/16 — Redmond, WA @ CHOMP! Festival
09/26 — Dana Point, CA @ Ohana Festival

Foo Fighters 2025 Tour Dates:
10/02 — Jakarta, ID @ Carnaval Ancol
10/04 — Singapore, SG @ F1
10/07 — Tokyo, JP @ Saitama Super Arena
10/10 — Osaka, JP @ Glion Arena Kobe
11/14 — Mexico City, MX @ Corona Capital
